title: The Favorites - Best Bets NFL Week 7
itunes:title: The Favorites - Best Bets NFL Week 7
description:
Sharp Calls, every gambler's favorite weekly segment, returns this week as Action Network host Chad Millman asks Simon Hunter to share some feedback from the pro gambling community about his picks, including a strong stance on the San Francisco 49ers. Together the duo narrow down their selections for their Week 7 content, along with an official Big Balls Bet of the Week on an NFC team. Plus, is Chad a Scientologist? Simon asks the hard questions on this week's episode! #Volume #Herd #ColinCowherd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
